summary: A young man harasses a homeless woman, another man protests, the police arrest both and the woman has to leave the country. What were their various story-lines leading up to this event?
cast: Juliette Binoche|Thierry Neuvic|Josef Bierbichler|Alexandre Hamidi|Maimouna Hélène Diarra|Ona Lu Yenke|Djibril Kouyaté|Luminita Gheorghiu|Crenguta Hariton|Bob Nicolescu|Bruno Todeschini|Paulus Manker|Didier Flamand|Walid Afkir|Maurice Bénichou|Carlo Brandt|Philippe Demarle|Marc Duret|Arsinée Khanjian|Florence Loiret Caille|Nathalie Richard|Andrée Tainsy|Elisabeth Marceul|Melissande Zeddam|Brandon Croteau|Sonia Chauvelin|Baptiste Gintzburger-Batle|Sarah Agogue Tasse|Alexandra Croteau|Jerome Ferreira|Melanie Lhote|José Marques|Guessi Diakite-Goumdo|Jean-Yves Chatelais|Laurent Suire|Féodor Atkine|Malick Bowens|Ioan Marian Boris|Monica Popa|Ada Navrot|Giba Gonçalves|Dominique Douret|Tsuyu Shimizu|Antoine Mathieu|Constantin Barbulescu|Domeke Meite|Aïssa Maïga|Marany Fofana|Costel Cascaval|Sandu Mihai Gruia|Daniel Dublet|Boris Napes|Isabelle Pietra|Cristina Ioanidis|Ion Haiduc|Guillaume Morvilliers|Pascal Loison|Jeff Cullen|Michael Haneke|Irina Lubtchansky
title: Código desconocido
